forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
